title: Ko1
author: Ko1
content: The Poloniex account is mine.Upon successfully depositing, poloniex asked me to do some verification, did everything they asked me to do still no reply from them and I'm in urgent need of money for some businesses.I can provide any proof you need, to proof to you that I'm the original owner of the account.What you will get??1. My ID and support to continue the verification process2. Both the account and email (gmail) password.3. Transactions and history of the funding source.4. Access to the account before buying.Starting bid ~ $1000Buy now.      ~ $6000I accept Escrow too.Accepting btc, PayPal payment.My telegram.   @LamPaxful

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: Do you have an urgent need to receive money and... set an auction without specifying a deadline? worst of all, how do you trust to send your documents around (if they are yours of course?)You need 1,000 euros and are willing to lose 9,000 immediately? I don't know something is wrong (a bit like the double telegram username  )

comments.author: SirAndre
comments.body: You need 1,000 euros and are willing to lose 9,000 immediately? I don't know something is wrong (a bit like the double telegram username  )[/quote] You won't understand cause you got food on your table and living comfortably, the double telegram? Is because I found out the first doesn't exist. Since most of you "older" members here got A1 when it's comes to trolling the new members, I'll understand. CHEERS!

Like I said I don't care what you think of me. I have give out the logins to 2 peoples already, you too can login and check of I'm really the owner or nah, better than acting saint here.
